mapper.insert: INSERT INTO environment(id, stationName, dataTime, khaiValue, so2Value, coValue, o3Value, no2Value, pm10Value, pm25Value, khaiGrade, so2Grade, coGrade, o3Grade, no2Grade, pm10Grade, pm25Grade) VALUES(0, #{stationName}, #{dataTime}, #{khaiValue}, #{so2Value}, #{coValue}, #{o3Value}, #{no2Value}, #{pm10Value}, #{pm25Value}, #{khaiGrade}, #{so2Grade}, #{coGrade}, #{o3Grade}, #{no2Grade}, #{pm10Grade}, #{pm25Grade})
